column4: i am making a cron job in unubtu...i have a file called abh.php in /home/abhinav/work/abh.php ....i want to run that file on every 2 hours.....i have searched on net and i have the following line ... 0 */2 * * * /home/abhinav/work/abh.php   now i want to know how to add this line to crontab ....please help me
after adding this line in crontab -e will it run my file after every 2 hours?
if you have the php cli interpreter then it should
